distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for keylime fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2022-3500: Fixed vulnerability where a node seems as attested when in reality it is not properly attested (bsc#1204782).
notes.title: Description of the patch

keylime-config-6.3.2-150400.4.14.1.noarch as component of openSUSE Leap 15.4

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in keylime. This security issue happens in some circumstances, due to some improperly handled exceptions, there exists the possibility that a rogue agent could create errors on the verifier that stopped attestation attempts for that host leaving it in an attested state but not verifying that anymore.
notes.title: CVE description
